metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22628 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw::stretch() function in libraw\src\postprocessing\aspect_ratio.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-22628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3
libraw19 - 0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> In focal, code is in dcraw/dcraw.c and internal/dcraw_common.cpp.

criterions.comment: darktable package in focal is affected and may need fixing.

libraw package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.19.5-1ubuntu1.3').
rawtherapee package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
